original_text: Now David was sitting between the two gates, and the watchman went up to the roof of the gate by the wall, and when he lifted up his eyes and looked, he saw a man running alone.
korean_text: 때에 다윗이 두 문 사이에 앉아 있더라 파수꾼이 성 문 위층에 올라가서 눈을 들어 보니 어떤 사람이 홀로 달려오는지라

sentences.original_text: Now David was sitting between the two gates
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 다윗은 두 성문 사이에 앉아 있었는데

sentences.original_text: the watchman went up to the roof of the gate by the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 망대병이 성벽에 있는 성문 지붕으로 올라갔는데

sentences.original_text: he lifted up his eyes and looked
he saw a man running alone
